description:
JOB TITLE: Ai Math Specialist in Austin, TX
• *TOP 3 SKILLS:** Master's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Physics, Excellen written and verbal communication skills
LOCATION: Austin, TX
DURATION: 12 months ongoing
RATE RANGE: $50

SUMMARY:
We are helping a global leader in AI development hire AI Mathematics Specialists to train generative artificial intelligence models to respond better to mathematical topics.

We are looking for highly qualified math experts who can quickly draft high-quality, accurate content.

In this role, you will be assigned to work on math-specific, high-priority projects for customers and/or to review (e.g. edit/grade) work done by others.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

As an AI Math Specialist, you will:
• Work on various tasks/projects to train generative AI models.
• Create original and challenging prompts for an AI model to respond to.
• Rank a series of responses that were produced by an AI model.
• Assess whether a piece of text produced by an AI model is factually accurate or not.

QUALIFICATIONS:
• Master's degree or equivalent proficiency in any of the following:
• Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Physics or similar
• Excellent attention to detail and the ability to maintain consistency in spotting writing errors and inconsistencies
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
• Local to Austin, TX and open to working in person 40 hours per week

Preferred qualifications:
• Completion or in pursuit of a PhD program that is heavily math-focused:
• Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Physics, or similar
• Teaching credentials
• Interest in AI and machine learning concepts
• Other specialties
